import React from 'react'; import Img from '../images/testimony1.png'; export default () => (

OUR STORY

Affordable Foundation Repair is Ottawa's trusted family-run foundation repair company. With roots deeply embedded in the community, our journey began when the Menafi family identified the need for reliable and budget-friendly foundation services. Our legacy is built on a commitment to top-notch quality, employing skilled experts and using premium materials to ensure lasting results without breaking the bank. As active community members, we take pride in not only strengthening structures but also nurturing the neighborhoods we serve. From preserving historical buildings to modern space transformation, Affordable Foundation Repair is your partner in crafting resilient and cost-effective foundations with a family touch. Experience the assurance of our unwavering commitment to building your projects on solid ground – the Affordable Foundation Repair family.

OUR MISSION

Our mission is to deliver high-quality foundation repair solutions that stand the test of time. We take pride in offering cost-effective services without compromising on the quality of our workmanship. Our team of skilled professionals is dedicated to ensuring your property's foundation is restored to its optimal condition, providing you with peace of mind and a solid foundation to build upon.

Why Choose Us

1. Expertise: Our team consists of experienced professionals who are well-versed in a wide range of foundation repair techniques. Whether you have cracks, settling issues, or drainage problems, we have the expertise to handle it all.

2. Affordable Solutions: As our name suggests, affordability is at the core of our business. We understand the importance of budget-friendly solutions without compromising on quality, and we aim to deliver the best value for your investment.

3. Personalized Approach: No two foundation issues are alike, and we treat each project with a personalized approach. We conduct a thorough assessment to understand the unique needs of your property and tailor our repair solutions accordingly.

4. Quality Materials: We believe in using top-quality materials and equipment to ensure the longevity and effectiveness of our repairs. Rest assured that your foundation is in safe hands with our commitment to excellence.

5. Customer Satisfaction: Customer satisfaction is our priority. From the initial consultation to the completion of the project, we communicate openly, address your concerns, and keep you informed every step of the way.

Founder

Mostafa Menafi, a seasoned entrepreneur with roots tracing back to Iran, embarked on a transformative journey that led him to the heart of Ottawa, Ontario. Armed with the skills forged through his military background, Mostafa laid the groundwork for his family-owned foundation repair company. Drawing from a lifetime of experiences, he has gained resilience, discipline, and a relentless pursuit for excellence. Mostafa’s journey transcends borders, a story of humble beginnings that motivated his desire to offer affordable services without compromising quality. His upbringing, defined by modesty, instilled in him an appreciation for the intrinsic value of diligent craftsmanship. This understanding fuels his unyielding pursuit of affordable yet exceptional workmanship, ensuring every project reflects the embodiment of his values. Mostafa’s legacy resonates through the strong foundations he builds, leaving a lasting impact on families and the community, just as he did with his own when he arrived in Ottawa years ago.
